AspectLibrary.Name: Example: Caching
AspectLibrary.Author: PostSharp Technologies
AspectLibrary.Summary: A serires of examples on how to implement a custom caching aspect using Metalama.

Aspect.Name: CacheAttribute
Aspect.Description: Custom attribute that, when applied on a method, causes the return value of the method to be cached for the specific list of arguments passed to this method call.
